duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide customer service leadership, training, and coaching for all store employees.
Maintain high retention by identifying qualified applicants, developing leaders, empowering employees, and encouraging employee productivity.
Oversee and implement all merchandising and marketing programs.
Use P&L and store reports to affect change.
Manage cash handling, fuel transactions, and promotion of loyalty program.
Maintain a clean, safe environment by complying with health and sanitation procedures to ensure the store is presentable and products are in-stock.
Perform repeated bending, standing, reaching, and occasionally lifting up to 50 pounds.
